entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 34 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 34 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 38.
